name: react-native-app-intro-slider
description: Simple and configurable app introduction slider for react native

scripts.android-apk-arefin-windows: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && .\gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.android-apk-arefin-Ubuntu: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.android-arefin-run: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && react-native run-android
scripts.dec-4-rn-57-2: cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease && cd .. react-native run-android --variant=release
